subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: What is the capital of Rajasthan and what does the state emblem of Rajasthan depict?
question_hi: राजस्थान की राजधानी और राजस्थान की राजधानी शिक्षक का विभाग केंकर का नाम है।
explanation_en:
The capital of Rajasthan is Jaipur (option A), and the Rajasthan State Emblem is divided into four sections, one of which is named after the Education Officer (option D). The Education section represents the Education symbol in the emblem.

In Hindi, the answer is: शिक्षा (option C), शिक्षा अधिकांत (option D) और Jaipur (option A) के ब्लॉग का नाम राजस्थान के अंग्रेंट सेवा का अंग्रेंगेंट अंग्रेंट सेवा का अंग्रेंगेंट सेवा
Education (option C) and Education Officer (option D) represent the Education section in the Rajasthan State Emblem, while Jaipur (option A) is the capital city of Rajasthan.
explanation_hi: शिक्षा (option C) और शिक्षा अधिकांट सेवा (option D) शिक्षा अंग्रेंगेंट सेवा का अंग्रेंगेंट सेवा
explanation_en: The Rajasthan State Emblem features Education (option C) and Education Officer (option D) as the symbols representing education, while Jaipur (option A) is the capital city.
